item.description:
The Socialist Party of Boston will meet at 1 pm on Sunday, 26 April 2009 in the Lucy Parsons Center. We will finalize our plans for May Day actions, along with other ongoing campaigns and upcoming events. A preliminary agenda will be available for input soon.

The Lucy Parsons Center is located at 549 Columbus Ave. in the South End, near the Mass Ave. T stop on the Orange Line, the Symphony T stop on the Green Line (E), and the #1 bus line.

See you there! :-)
item.how_to_find_us: Call 248/303-3785 if you don't see us.
item.name: The Boston Democratic Socialism April Meetup
